command: sudo REALM_PORT=4010 REALM_SSL_PORT=4011 SHARD_PORT=4020 SHARD_SSL_PORT=4021 LOG=0 LOG_PREFIX=[RERS] NODE_ENV=production /usr/bin/node -r tsconfig-paths/register --max_semi_space_size=30000 --max-old-space-size=30000 --initial-old-space-size=8000 --optimize-for-size --experimental-modules --experimental-json-modules
